Past Events

June 16, 2016

London, UK

Morrison & Foerster’s “Coming to America” Seminar

SelectUSA Investment Specialist Gus Franklyn-Bute will join Morrison & Foerster LLP’s “Coming to America” seminar in London on June 16. Aimed at European FinTech startups considering U.S. expansion, the session will hightlight issues on laws and regulations as well as preparing for investment. Mr. Franklyn-Bute will join panel members from Startupbootcamp FinTech and FinTech Circle Innovate to highlight what startups should expect and prepare for when entering the U.S. market.

For more information and registration, please visit the event webiste, or contact Gus Franklyn-Bute (gus.franklyn-bute@trade.gov).
